p: Citrus aurantium EO, also known as neroli oil, is widely used in aromatherapy. It has been suggested that it stimulates central nervous system, lowers blood pressure, and has sedative, analgesic, anti-inflammatory, antispasmodic, carminative, digestive, and diuretic effects [ 27]. It is a strongly scented bitter liquid, produced by hydrodistillation of Citrus aurantium fresh lives [ 28].
